meanings.sent1: She rewraps the gift to make it look nicer.
meanings.sent2: He always rewraps his sandwiches before putting them in his lunchbox.
meanings.sent3: The cat rewraps itself in the blanket every time it moves.
meanings.sent4: The magician rewraps the scarf around his arm, making it disappear.
meanings.sent5: The chef rewraps the sushi rolls with precision and care.

meanings.sent1: The rewraps on the present made it look even more special.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the rewraps to reveal the hidden treasure inside.
meanings.sent3: The rewraps on the candy were so tight, it was hard to open.
meanings.sent4: The rewraps of the bandages protected the wound from getting infected.
meanings.sent5: The rewraps of the gift added an extra layer of excitement for the recipient.

meanings.definition: describing something that has been wrapped again
meanings.sent1: The rewraps package looked brand new.
meanings.sent2: The rewraps box had a neat and tidy appearance.
meanings.sent3: The rewraps present seemed like a fun surprise.
meanings.sent4: The rewraps candy had a fresh and appealing look.
meanings.sent5: The rewraps gift had a charming and thoughtful touch.
